Anora.description: For the third weekend in a row, “Venom: The Last Dance” was the No. 1 movie at the box office, collecting $16.2 million in ticket sales in U.S. and Canadian theaters. Studio estimates released Sunday show “Venom” fended off a pair of new challengers in the Hu…

Anora.title: Former Del. Matt Fariss convicted of drug possession, firearm charges
Anora.description: A former state delegate who represented parts of the Lynchburg region, Matt Fariss, pleaded guilty in a Campbell County courtroom Wednesday to possession of a methamphetamine and having a firearm on him while in possession of an illegal drug.
